lines.transliteration_english: Nimakh Nimakh Nis Nis Paramaan Hoi , Pal Pal Maas Parayant Hvai Bidaaree Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: May every moment of my union with the Lord become night long and every second of this meeting become month long.

lines.gurmukhi: brK brK prXMq Gitkw ibhwie jug jug sm jwm jwmnI ipAwrI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Barakh Barakh Parayant Ghatikaa Bihaai , Joug Joug Sam Jaam Jaamanee Piaaree Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: May each watch be a year long while each pehar (a quarter of a day) become equal to an epoch.

lines.gurmukhi: klw klw koit gun jgmg joiq sis pRym rs pRbl pRqwp AiDkwrI hY
lines.transliteration_english: Kalaa Kalaa Koti Goun Jagamag Joti Sasi , Praym Ras Prabal Prataap Adhikaaree Hai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: May each trait of the moon change into millions of traits and enlightens in bright radiance; and the grandeur of love elixir may become more and more powerful.

lines.gurmukhi: mn bc kRm piRXw syvw snmuK rhoN Awrsu n AwvY inMdRw Awj myrI bwrI hY ]654]
lines.transliteration_english: Man Bach Kram Priyaa Sayvaa Sanamoukh Rahon , Aarasu N Aavai Nindraa Aaj Mayree Baaree Hai ?654?

Shabad OS B.translation: Now that an opportunity of meeting with Lord on the heart like bed has come up in this invaluable life as a human being, then let me remain engrossed in the voiceless voice meditation of the Lord on account of my mind, words and actions. May I not sleep n
